author: costin
msg: -fixed tomcat back ( it was broken by the previous commit)
-added few more comments
-changed a bit of the workdir madness
-added few commented-out print lines ( used in debugging, we might need them
again - need a Logger !)
-removed some of the guessing from Context. DefaultContextSetter ( or another
user interceptor) will set default values.
-added error message to more errors.

author: costin
msg: - Added workDir as a porperty of contextManager.
- default values will be returned if none is set up, that
would simplify embeding tomcat ( little configuration if
defaults are ok, or change only what you need ).

author: costin
msg: - removed unused properties from Context and HttpServer
- cleaned up the addition of contexts ( addContext(Context) )

author: costin
msg: Removed contextByPath - all contexts are keyed by path in contextManager.

author: costin
msg: New script to run only the client side of tomcat's tests.
( start server / runclient / stop server).
Added a test.xml script for ant-driven tests ( will make the
shell/bat scripts obsolete if someone has time to continue it).
It uses the <java RunTest>.
The advantage is that if something fails you can keep testing
without running all the tests or stoping the server.
